name: Isomorphism of Categories
definition: A **Functor** $F:C\to D$ is an **isomorphism of categories** if there exists a functor $G:D\to C$ such that $F \circ G = id_D$ and $G \circ F = id_C$.
description: A #functor is an isomorphism if it has an inverse functor and both compositions are the identity.
